Index.title: Welcome to Soul Comfort Site
Index.dailyQuote: Every dawn is a new beginning.
Index.treeHoleDescription: Share your thoughts and feelings with our empathetic AI companion.

TreeHole.title: AI Tree Hole
TreeHole.description: A safe space to share your thoughts and feelings. Our AI is here to listen and support you.
TreeHole.disclaimer: Note: This is an AI assistant and not a substitute for professional mental health support. If you're experiencing serious issues, please seek help from qualified professionals.
TreeHole.startConversation: Start a conversation by typing a message below...

Chat.startConversation: Start a conversation by typing a message below...

Upgrade.title: Upgrade Your Account
Upgrade.subtitle: Get unlimited access to our AI emotional support services
Upgrade.usageCount: You've used {count} out of {limit} free messages
Upgrade.faqQuestion1: How does the payment system work?
Upgrade.faqAnswer1: We offer two payment options: monthly subscriptions for unlimited conversations, and pay-as-you-go packages where you can purchase conversation credits that never expire.
Upgrade.faqQuestion2: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
Upgrade.faqAnswer2: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll still have access to the service until the end of your billing period.
Upgrade.faqQuestion3: What payment methods do you accept?
Upgrade.faqAnswer3: We accept major credit cards and PayPal for all transactions. All payments are securely processed by our payment provider.

Payment.paymentSuccessDescription: Your payment has been completed and credits have been added to your account.
Payment.errorMissingParams: Missing required parameters during payment processing.
Payment.errorPaymentIncomplete: Payment was not completed. Please try again.
Payment.errorVerificationFailed: Payment verification failed. Please contact support.
Payment.errorServerError: Server error while processing payment. Please try again later.

Login.title: Sign In or Sign Up
Login.link_signin: Already have an account? Sign in
Login.link_signup: Don't have an account? Sign up

UpgradePage.title: Upgrade Your Plan
UpgradePage.description: Choose the package that's right for you and unlock more features.
UpgradePage.loginPrompt: Please log in to view available packages.
